q_en: What are the cutting tasks assigned to Precision Cutters?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Precision Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Precision Cutters"
Retrieve the cutting tasks assigned to the working group "Precision Cutters"
